item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:10, so let's meet right inside the doors BY 6:40, then we'll go buy our tickets and snacks.

Call me if you're going to be late or have to change your RSVP last-minute. (508-308-4897)

--Dana



OLD STUFF:
Will Smith is at it again with Seven Pounds. This time he's part of a very mysterious movie (the trailers are awesome) about the kindness of strangers.

Summary:
Ben Thomas is an IRS agent with a fateful secret who embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

That's it. That's all. I love Will Smith, so let's embark on the adventure together.

I'll update the meetup with exact time a few days before, but let's go see the Tuesday evening/night movie.

Discounted tickets for FMM members and their guests is $8.50. (Just be sure to include guests in your RSVP.) Small popcorn and small soda vouchers are available for $3.00 each. Please be sure to include guests in your RSVP, so I know how many to expect. Exact change makes me like you more.

Hope to see you at Seven Pounds!

--Dana
item.name: Seven Pounds
